title: 115_hr2536
content: Renew America's Schools Act of 2017 This bill requires the Department of Energy to provide competitive grants for making energy improvements in schools. Specifically, grants may be awarded for: any improvement, repair, or renovation to a school that will result in a direct reduction in school energy costs. Any improvement, repair, renovation, or installation that leads to an improvement in teacher and student health, such as indoor air quality. And the installation of renewable energy technologies involved in the improvement, repair, or renovation to a school.
